directions: In a nonreactive bowl, mix together the grapefruit juice, lime juice, wine vinegar, light soy sauce, ginger, basil, thyme, and dill. Use as marinade for fish, poultry, or meats; refrigerate while marinating.
ingredients: 1 (5 inch) ginger root, peeled and minced
1 cup coarsely chopped fresh basil leaves
title: Grapefruit and Ginger Marinade
